data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_e1097b9d3e1d5e9f14600d32e8b18acd.png

skilllist.skilldesc: <font color="a6aafb">Dexter</font> assists Claude on each of his Basic Attacks, dealing 25<font color="fba51f"> (+25% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the same target (inherits a portion of Attack Effects).

Claude emits a disruption wave in the target direction, dealing 250<font color="fba51f"> (+40% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in a fan-shaped area and reducing their Movement Speed by 20% and Attack Speed by 10%.

For each enemy hit, Claude gains 4% Movement & Attack Speed (doubled for enemy heroes hit) for 6s (up to 5 stacks).

Claude conjures a mirror image of <font color="a6aafb">Dexter</font> at the target location that automatically attacks nearby enemies for 5.5s. The mirror image's Basic Attack deals 25<font color="fba51f"> (+25% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and can trigger Claude's attack effects.

<font color="a6aafb">Use Again</font>: Claude switches places with the mirror image.

Claude and <font color="a6aafb">Dexter</font> rapidly fire at nearby enemies for 3s, dealing 140<font color="fba51f"> (+10% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to up to two enemies with each shot (these attacks count as Basic Attacks). Claude also gains a 20<font color="fba51f"> (+3% Total Physical Attack)</font> shield each time the Ultimate deals damage to an enemy.

data.name: Claude

__data.skilldesc: For 3s, gain 35% <font color="62f8fe">Damage Reduction</font> and deal 35% <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> back to the attacker each time you receive damage.
__data.skilldesc_text: For <Num1>s, gain <%Num3> [C2Damage Reduction] and deal <%Num2> [C1Magic Damage] back to the attacker each time you receive damage.
__data.skilldescemblem: For 3s, gain 35% <font color="62f8fe">Damage Reduction</font> and deal 35% <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> back to the attacker each time you receive damage.

recommendmasterplan.description: Gold Lane: Join teamfights at the right time to finish enemies off with Ultimate.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+15% Extra Attack Speed
+16 Adaptive Attack
+5% Lifesteal

emblemskill.skilldesc: Cooldowns of Battle Spells and equipment's active skills are reduced by 15%.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Cooldowns of Battle Spells and equipment's active skills are reduced by <%Num1>.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Cooldowns of Battle Spells and equipment's active skills are reduced by 15%.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
After killing an enemy hero, instantly recover 15% of Lost HP and gain 20% Movement Speed.

<font color="8098ab">Duration: 3s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: After killing an enemy hero, instantly recover <%Num1> of Lost HP and gain <%Num2> Movement Speed.########[8098ab]Duration: <Num3>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
After killing an enemy hero, instantly recover 15% of Lost HP and gain 20% Movement Speed.

<font color="8098ab">Duration: 3s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Valor: Gain 4 extra Physical Defense for 3s when taking Physical Damage, up to 20.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Valor: Gain 4 extra Physical Defense for 3s when taking Physical Damage, up to 20.
equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Movement Speed
+18 Extra Physical Defense

equiplist.equipskill1: Engulf: Basic Attacks deal 8% of the target's current HP as extra Physical Damage (capped at 60 against minions).
equiplist.equipskill2: Devour: Basic Attacks grant 2% Lifesteal for 3s (stacks up to 5 times).
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Engulf: Basic Attacks deal 8% of the target's current HP as extra Physical Damage (capped at 60 against minions).
Devour: Basic Attacks grant 2% Lifesteal for 3s (stacks up to 5 times).
equiplist.equiptips:
+35 Extra Physical Attack
+20% Extra Attack Speed
+8% Lifesteal

equiplist.equipskill1: Swift: Every 1% extra Crit Chance gained is converted into 1% extra Attack Speed.
equiplist.equipskill2: Endless Strike: After every 2 non-Crit Basic Attacks, the Attack Speed of the next Basic Attack is increased by 80% (and Attack Speed cap is increased to 500%) and triggers Attack Effects an additional 2 time(s).
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Swift: Every 1% extra Crit Chance gained is converted into 1% extra Attack Speed.
Endless Strike: After every 2 non-Crit Basic Attacks, the Attack Speed of the next Basic Attack is increased by 80% (and Attack Speed cap is increased to 500%) and triggers Attack Effects an additional 2 time(s).
equiplist.equiptips:
+55 Extra Physical Attack
+15% Extra Attack Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Corrosion: Basic Attacks gain 80 extra Physical Damage and slow the target by 8% (halved for ranged Basic Attacks) for 1.5s. Stacks up to 5 times.
equiplist.equipskill3: Impulse: Basic Attacks grant 6% extra Attack Speed for 3s, capped at 5 stacks.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Corrosion: Basic Attacks gain 80 extra Physical Damage and slow the target by 8% (halved for ranged Basic Attacks) for 1.5s. Stacks up to 5 times.
Impulse: Basic Attacks grant 6% extra Attack Speed for 3s, capped at 5 stacks.
equiplist.equiptips:
+30 Extra Physical Attack
+5% Movement Speed
+30% Extra Attack Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Wind Chant: Immune to all Physical Damage
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Wind Chant: Immune to all Physical Damage
equiplist.equiptips:
+30 Extra Physical Attack
+20% Extra Attack Speed
+10% Lifesteal

equiplist.equipskill1: Armor Buster: Increase Physical Penetration by 30%.
equiplist.equipskill2: Breaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 30%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Armor Buster: Increase Physical Penetration by 30%.
Breaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 30%.
equiplist.equiptips: +60 Extra Physical Attack

recommendmasterplan.name: MELONN
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: An excellent thief who comes and goes without a trace.

assist.desc: Claude works best with heroes who can buff him, like Angela and Faramis.

strong.desc: Claude is strong against heroes with weak CC abilities and poor Mobility, so he can easily dodge their attacks with his 2nd Skill, such as Vexana and Luo Yi.

weak.desc: Claude is countered by heroes with powerful CC abilities. Their CC abilities will cause Claude to lose his Mobility advantage. Like Eudora and Franco.
